name: Mark Timothy Agarrado
text: you won't immediately notice much improvement when switching from a generic mouse to a gaming mouse.    BUT! once you get used to your new fancy gaming mouse, you'll definitely feel the difference once you switch back to a regular generic mouse.    they track better/ smoother, and generally should last longer. in case they fail, they usually come with a 2 year warranty (the Razer ones at least).
